text: Yevdokiya () is a 1961 Soviet romantic drama movie directed by Tatyana Lioznova.Путин и Мишустин поздравили актрису Людмилу Хитяеву с юбилеемЕвдокия It stars Lyudmila Khityaeva, Nikolai Lebedev, and Alevtina Rumyantseva. == Actors == * Lyudmila Khityaeva as Yevdokiya * Nikolai Lebedev as Yevdokim * Alevtina Rumyantseva as Natalia * Lyuba Basova as Natalia in childhood * Olga Narovchatova as Natalia in youth * Vladimir Ivashov as Pavel Chernyshev == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 romantic drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet romance movies Category:Movies directed by Tatyana Lioznova
title: Yevdokiya
